name: root
title: :root Selector
desc: Selects the element that is the root of the document.

argument.desc: The index of each child to match, starting with 1, the string even or odd, or an equation ( eg. :nth-last-child(even), :nth-last-child(4n) )
argument.name: index

examples.desc: Display the tag name of the root element.
examples.css: span.fot { color: red; font-size: 120%; font-style: italic; }
examples.html: The root of this document is:

entries.longdesc: In HTML, the root of the document, and thus the element that $(":root") selects, is always the <html> element.
